sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import table from './images/table.jpg' import { io } from "socket.io-client"; import OrderList from './OrderList'; const ENDPOINT = "http://localhost:5501"; const socket = io(ENDPOINT); function TablesList() { const [dishes, setDishes] = useState() const [table1_border, setTable1_border] = useState("card") const [table2_border, setTable2_border] = useState("card") const [table3_border, setTable3_border] = useState("card") const [table4_border, setTable4_border] = useState("card") const [table1_button, setTable1_button] = useState("btn btn-dark") const [table2_button, setTable2_button] = useState("btn btn-dark") const [table3_button, setTable3_button] = useState("btn btn-dark") const [table4_button, setTable4_button] = useState("btn btn-dark") useEffect(() => { socket.on('receive-order', (payload) => { setDishes({[payload.table]: payload}) if (payload.table === 1) { setTable1_border("card border-success") setTable1_button("btn btn-success") } else if (payload.table === 2) { setTable2_border("card border-success") setTable2_button("btn btn-success") } else if (payload.table === 3) { setTable3_border("card border-success") setTable3_button("btn btn-success") } else { setTable4_border("card border-success") setTable4_button("btn btn-success") } }) }, []) const viewOrder = (table) => e => { if (table === 1) { setTable1_border("card border-warning") setTable1_button("btn btn-warning") } else if ( table === 2 ) { setTable2_border("card border-warning") setTable2_button("btn btn-warning") } else if ( table === 3 ) { setTable3_border("card border-warning") setTable3_button("btn btn-warning") } else { setTable4_border("card border-warning") setTable4_button("btn btn-warning") } } const orderComplete = (table) => e => { if (table === 1) { setTable1_border("card") setTable1_button("btn btn-dark") } else if ( table === 2 ) { setTable2_border("card") setTable3_button("btn btn-dark") } else if ( table === 3 ) { setTable1_border("card") setTable1_button("btn btn-dark") } setDishes([]) } return (
Table 1
